name: The New Rat King
description:
If possible, please use the downloadable versions. They're the rats

Scientists have found a weird cave with tribal symbols, but they've decided not to go inside in person. Instead, they send you to go deeper and deeper and explore the truth about the ancient rat civilization.

Modern robot in a rat-infested cave system

Many adventures await... or more like 5 because that's exactly how many levels there are.

An in-game tutorial is available.
